rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs, metaphors, superlatives, or alert phrases.
This segment discusses financial/trade metrics, which are excluded from Q3.
No loaded rhetorical question is present in the segment.
The segment reports production projections, which are factual statements without explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser + scale contrast for reassurance.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes production projections, not capability or preparedness related to disease control.
'will produce up to 14.9 million tons... and up to 15.35 million tons' reports production volume factually.
